title: Lightnin' Hopkins - [1946] The Complete Aladdin Recordings (FLAC
description:
Lightnin' Hopkins - The Complete Aladdin Recordings

Release Date: 1991
Recording Date: November 9, 1946


Review by Bill Dahl
This is where it all began for the Houston troubadour: 43 solo sides, as evocative and stark as any he ever did. The first 13 sides find the guitarist in tandem with pianist Wilson "Thunder" Smith (who handles the vocals on a few tracks), but after that, old Lightnin' Hopkins went the solo route. "Katie May," "Short Haired Woman," "Abilene," "Shotgun" -- all these and more rate with his seminal performances.

2. Feel So Bad
3. Backwater Blues (That Mean Old Twister)
4. I Can't Stay Here in Your Town
5. Can't Do Like You Used To

15. Woman, Woman
16. Picture on the Wall
17. You're Not Goin' to Worry My Life Anymore
18. You're Gonna Miss Me
19. Sugar on My Mind
20. Nightmare Blues
21. Someday Baby
22. Come Back Baby

(Disc 2)
